alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 4:51AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Red Lake, southeastern Polk, western Beltrami, north central Mahnomen, eastern Pennington and northwestern Clearwater Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 451 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Winger, or 41 miles south of Thief River Falls, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fosston around 455 AM CDT. McIntosh and Erskine around 500 AM CDT. Trail around 510 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Oklee and Roland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Mahnomen; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake
